overview: Christine Breese, D.D., Ph.D. is the founder of the University of Metaphysical Sciences (UMS). She is 40 years old and has walked many spiritual paths, including Eastern philosophies, Native American traditions, Nature Religions and modernized meditation techniques free of philosophic or dogmatic systems. Christine Breese studied religions, self help books, and learned how to heal and find harmony. Breese then pursued formal studies in metaphysics in order to open University Of Metaphysical Sciences. She holds her Doctor Of Divinity Degree in Metaphysical Sciences, as well as her Ph.D. in Metaphysical Counseling. Christine Breese also holds an Associates Degree in Film And Video Production, and another in Audio Engineering. She outlined and designed many of the courses and much the research. She directed and co-ordinated a team of more than 40 writers and teachers who specialize in various metaphysical subjects. Christine Breese also edited all material in the curriculum. She is a respected author and teacher, and has done much to help her community.
